Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only serves its intended purpose but also embodies a level of excellence that exceeds expectations. Given its unique features and high standards, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $100. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that combines functionality, durability, and style at a price that represents its true value. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
